column5: Has anyone crossed the border using the Thousand Islands Bridge or Ogdensburg-Prescott Bridge? I’m just looking for your overall experience, and, more importantly, were you selected for a random test?

I know the thousand islands bridge was lined up for miles the day it opened. The guards are on a work to rule campaign apparently and have been told to average 10 mins per vehicle vs the usual 1-3mins. I live 45 mins from there on Canadian side. Sent from my iPhone using Tapatalk
Work to rule campaign??? The contract dispute was resolved so not following???
Where do you get this stuff? I crossed on Monday and my car took five minutes. My wife drove in another car and it took her less than three minutes. The strike has been resolved.Frank
At that time it was the case. I get this stuff from a friend that is a border Guard. Thanks chief Sent from my iPhone using Tapatalk
Friend crossed at Thousand Islands 6:00 AM Thursday. Only 3 vehicles ahead of him. Less than five minutes at the booth. Had all required paperwork in order.
